definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc

sentences.english: Egypt is the chair and China is the co-chair of the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 埃及是本屆會議主席國，中國爲共同主席國。

sentences.english: Egypt is the chair and China is the co-chair of the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 埃及是本屆會議主席國，中國爲共同主席國。

sentences.english: Indonesia is the largest country in ASEAN and is ASEAN's rotating presidency this year.
sentences.chinese: 印尼是東盟最大的國家，今年擔任東盟輪值主席國。

sentences.english: In January Ireland takes over the six-monthly presidency of the EU.
sentences.chinese: 從一月開始，愛爾蘭接任爲期半年的歐盟輪值主席國。

sentences.english: Finland is the current president of the 25-member European Union.
sentences.chinese: 芬蘭是有25個成員的歐盟的輪值主席國。
